name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser for Oily Skin
description: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser gently removes excess oil, dirt & makeup while maintaining the skin’s natural barrier. Ideal for normal to oily skin, it features ceramides & niacinamide for hydration & soothing.

name: CARE:NEL by Dr.SKIN
description: Care:nel by Dr. Skin is a skincare solution designed to hydrate, nourish, and rejuvenate, promoting healthier, smoother, and glowing skin.

name: Mucin Powder Essence
description: Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Powder Essence deeply hydrates and repairs skin, boosting elasticity and texture with snail mucin for a smoother, glowing complexion.

name: Dr. Clinic Eye Makeup Remover
description: Dr. Clinic Eye Makeup Remover gently removes makeup without irritation, leaving the delicate eye area clean and refreshed while maintaining skin moisture.

name: Day and Night Cream
description: Care:nel Day and Night Cream provides deep hydration and nourishment, protecting skin during the day and repairing it overnight for a smooth, rejuvenated complexion.

name: Natural Aura Night Cream
description: Natural Aura Night Cream deeply nourishes and revitalizes the skin overnight, promoting a smooth, hydrated, and glowing complexion by morning.

name: Anti Melasma Whitemn Cream
description: Anti Melasma Whitemn Cream targets dark spots and hyperpigmentation, brightening and evening skin tone while reducing the appearance of melasma for a clearer complexion.

name: Care:nel Brighter Cream
description: Care:nel Brighter Cream is designed to brighten and even out skin tone, helping to reduce dark spots and hyperpigmentation for a radiant, glowing complexion.

name: Creme 21
description: Creme 21 from Germany is a nourishing, non-greasy moisturizer that deeply hydrates the skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and revitalized for daily use.

name: Dark Spot Correcting Cream
description: Dark Spot Correcting Cream targets hyperpigmentation, reducing the appearance of dark spots and uneven skin tone for a clearer, brighter complexion.

name: CeraVe Psoriasis Cleanser
description: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser gently removes excess oil, dirt & makeup while maintaining the skin’s natural barrier. Ideal for normal to oily skin, it features ceramides & niacinamide for hydration & soothing.

name: St. Ives Renewing Moisturizer
description: A hydrating moisturizer with collagen and elastin to nourish and rejuvenate skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and youthful-looking.

name: Care:Nel Anti-Melasma
description: Care:Nel Anti-Melasma Cica Cream helps reduce melasma, dark spots, and redness with soothing cica and brightening ingredients. Achieve an even, radiant complexion with daily use.

name: Beautiful Magnolia Scented Candle - Floral Bliss
description: Immerse your space in the enchanting fragrance of magnolia with this Beautiful Magnolia scented candle. Perfect for creating a calm, floral atmosphere in any room.

name: Catherine Malandrino Mystere Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Unveil the elegance of Catherine Malandrino Mystere, a captivating eau de parfum blending floral and woody notes. Perfect for adding a touch of mystery and sophistication.

name: Catherine Malandrino Violet Gem Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: Discover the luxurious essence of Catherine Malandrino Violet Gem. A delicate blend of violet, musk, and citrus, this fragrance exudes elegance and timeless beauty.

name: Jimmy Choo Blossom Eau de Parfum
description: Indulge in the vibrant and playful scent of Jimmy Choo Blossom. A refreshing blend of sweet berries, citrus, and floral notes, perfect for a joyful, elegant fragrance experience.

name: Mad About You Fragrance Mist
description: Fall in love with the irresistible scent of Mad About You. A romantic blend of black currant, peony, and vanilla, this fragrance mist leaves you feeling refreshed and enchanted.

name: Soulful Nanette Lepore Eau de Parfum
description: Embrace the essence of elegance with Soulful Nanette Lepore. A captivating fragrance that blends floral, woody, and fruity notes, offering a sophisticated and empowering scent.

name: Transcendent Catherine Malandrino Eau de Parfum
description: Experience the allure of Transcendent Catherine Malandrino. A harmonious blend of florals, warm spices, and creamy notes, this fragrance embodies elegance and timeless sophistication.

name: You're the One Fragrance Mist
description: Delight in the irresistible charm of You're the One. A romantic blend of rose, vanilla, and white birch, this fragrance mist creates a captivating, warm, and enchanting scent.

name: Zara Man Silver Eau de Toilette
description: Zara Man Silver is a bold and fresh fragrance with notes of citrus, lavender, and wood. Ideal for the modern man, it exudes sophistication and confidence throughout the day.

name: Daily Tone-Up Vitamin Cica Sunscreen
description: A lightweight sunscreen with Vitamin C and Cica that brightens, soothes, and protects skin from UV rays while providing a natural tone-up effect.

name: Lois Chloe Sunscreen Cream SPF Protection
description: A hydrating sunscreen cream that shields skin from harmful UV rays while nourishing and keeping it soft, smooth, and naturally radiant all day.

name: Neogence UV Defense Hydrating Sunscreen
description: A lightweight, hydrating sunscreen that protects against UVA/UVB rays while keeping skin moisturized, smooth, and radiant without a greasy feel.

name: Guerniss Everyday Protection Lotion
description: A lightweight, non-greasy lotion that hydrates and protects skin from environmental damage, keeping it soft, smooth, and nourished all day long.

name: Nior Aqua Splash Sunscreen
description: A lightweight, water-resistant sunscreen that hydrates and protects skin from UV rays, leaving a fresh, non-greasy finish for all-day defense.

name: Eucerin Oil Control Sunscreen
description: A mattifying, lightweight sunscreen with SPF protection that controls excess oil, reduces shine, and helps prevent sun-induced skin damage.

name: HeedBeauty Sunscreen SPF 50
description: A lightweight, non-greasy sunscreen that provides broad-spectrum protection, hydrates the skin, and prevents sun damage for a radiant, healthy glow.

name: Palette Intensive Color Creme 1.1 Blue Black
description: A rich, long-lasting blue-black hair color with deep conditioning formula that nourishes hair while providing vibrant shine and intense coverage.

name: Palette Intensive Color Creme 7.1 Cool Brown
description: A deep cool brown hair color with long-lasting shine, full gray coverage, and a nourishing formula that keeps hair soft, healthy, and vibrant.

name: Palette Intensive Color Creme 4.0 Middle Brown
description: Achieve rich, natural middle brown hair with full gray coverage. The nourishing formula enhances shine, softness, and long-lasting vibrant color.

name: Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-88 Dark Red
description: Get an intense dark red shade with deep pigmentation and lasting vibrancy. The nourishing formula ensures rich color, shine, and full gray coverage.

name: Palette Intensive Color Creme 4-89 Aubergine
description: Achieve a bold aubergine shade with long-lasting vibrancy. This nourishing formula provides deep color, shine, and full gray coverage for a stunning look.

name: Palette Intensive Color Creme 8-0 Brown
description: Get a natural brown shade with rich, long-lasting color. This formula deeply nourishes hair while providing full gray coverage and a radiant, glossy finish.

name: Palette Intensive Color Creme Ash Blonde
description: Achieve a cool, ashy blonde shade with intense, long-lasting color. The nourishing formula provides full gray coverage and leaves hair silky and vibrant.

name: Note Ultra Rich Color Lip Pencil
description: A creamy, highly pigmented lip pencil that glides smoothly, defining lips with intense color and long-lasting wear for a flawless finish.

name: Topface Waterproof Lipliner
description: A smudge-proof, long-lasting lip liner with a waterproof formula that ensures precise definition, vibrant color, and all-day wear without fading.

name: Nior Super Long-Lasting Eyeliner
description: A highly pigmented, waterproof eyeliner that delivers intense color and precise definition, ensuring a smudge-proof, all-day wear.

name: Essence Longlasting Eye Pencil
description: A smooth, highly pigmented eye pencil in a stunning purple shade, offering long-lasting, smudge-proof wear for bold and defined eye looks.

name: 3 Fashion Eyelashes - 3 Faux Cils
description: A set of three stylish faux eyelashes, adding volume and length for a glamorous, natural, or dramatic eye look. Lightweight and comfortable wear.

name: Pink Magic Waterproof Black Kajal
description: A smudge-proof, waterproof kajal that delivers intense black color for all-day wear. Glides smoothly for precise application and bold definition.

name: Evely Beauties HD Loose Setting Powder
description: A lightweight, finely milled setting powder that blurs imperfections, controls shine, and provides a smooth, long-lasting matte finish.

name: Weightless Full Cover Fit Foundation
description: A high-coverage, lightweight foundation that blends seamlessly, providing a flawless, natural matte finish while keeping skin hydrated and breathable.

name: I Love Extreme Volume Mascara
description: A high-impact mascara that delivers intense volume and bold, dramatic lashes with a deep black formula, ensuring long-lasting, smudge-proof wear.

name: Beauti4me Matte Finish Primer
description: A lightweight primer that controls oil, minimizes pores, and creates a smooth matte finish, ensuring a flawless, long-lasting makeup look.

name: Beauti4me Light Beige Concealer Stick
description: A smooth, lightweight concealer that hides dark circles, blemishes, and imperfections while providing a natural, long-lasting finish.

name: Beauti4me VD Brown Matte Lipstick
description: A richly pigmented brown matte lipstick that glides smoothly, delivering long-lasting, comfortable wear with a bold, velvety finish

name: Everly Beauties Blush & Sculpt Kit
description: A versatile blush and contour kit that enhances your natural glow, adding warmth and dimension for a sculpted, radiant complexion all day long.

name: Essence Lash Princess Mascara
description: This mascara lifts, lengthens, and defines for bold, long-lasting eye makeup.

name: Bote Makeup Instyle Matte Powder 04
description: A lightweight matte powder that controls shine, blurs imperfections, and provides a smooth, flawless finish for a long-lasting, natural look.

name: French Love Matte Lipstick - Long-Lasting & Velvety
description: French Love Matte Lipstick delivers intense color with a smooth, velvety matte finish. Lightweight, long-lasting, and non-drying, it keeps your lips soft and beautifully bold all day.
